name: The Flintstones: The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy
name_original: The Flintstones: The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy
description: The Flintstones: The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy is a 1991 platform video game by Taito for the Nintendo Entertainment System based on the animated series The Flintstones. Taito later released another Flintstones game for the NES titled The Flintstones: Surprise at Dinosaur Peak.
